original_text: The Philistine slowly walked towards David. The man who was carrying his shield walked in front of him.
korean_text: 블레셋 사람이 방패 든 사람을 앞세우고 다윗에게로 점점 가까이 나아가니라

sentences.original_text: The Philistine slowly walked towards David
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 사람이 다윗을 향해 천천히 걸어갔다

sentences.original_text: The man who was carrying his shield
